title: HOW TO DO ALIGNMENT QUICK+EASY AT HOME FOR CARS+TRUCKS | DODGE RAM ALIGN TOE TRACKING PREALIGNMENT

json.text:
Hi everyone this is geRAMicc85, and today
I want to show you how I do a pre-alignment
for my truck.

Because I put in some new steering parts and
as you know you always have to get a new alignment
when you put in new parts.

I just put them in and now I am doing a pre-alignment
so that I can actually drive around safely.

What I did is, I put a small rope that you
see here in the middle of the tire.

It runs from the rear from the one side up
to the front.

To the other side, all around the car to the
rear again.

This way I can go around and check whether
there is a gap, like here.

So what I am going to do now is, I am going
to loosen up the adjusting sleeve on the steering
tie rods.

And then that way I will pull in or out the
tire.

Whenever I did steering repairs I had to do
this, and it always worked out fine.

This is just one idea to do a simple alignment
at home, in order to get to the alignment
shop safely basically.

That's it, I thank you very much for watching
and I hope this helps you out.
If so please press like.

For more videos on my dodge ram 1500 you can
go to my channel and subscribe if you like.
I appreciate every subscriber!

I wish you a good day, geRAMicc85 signing
out.
